I quite like this top. It can be dressed up a bit, or kept simple. I have had many compliments on it.  It was rather wrinkled but after washing it a few times, the wrinkles and folds did fade away.  True to size.

Fabric is very soft, color is pretty and quality is good, but as with many other sweatshirts from Amazon,  it is not long enough to wear with leggings.
Cute sweatshirt, but it was thin material (not bad, just thinner than normal). I do have long monkey arms, but these shirts seem to be made for someone with T-Rex arms.

I bought the burgundy color in an XL. I am 5'3" and weigh 240. Since it's oversized, I thought the XL would be big enough-it states the bust is 46" and my girls are small compared to my large frame. Well, it's kind of tight. No stretch in torso. It's very warm though and soft. But the other disappointment is the sleeve length. If it's oversized, I expected the sleeves to be as well. They aren't. They do not even go down all the way to my wrist. Probably a good inch to inch and a half from wrist. I like my sleeves to go up to my thumbs. I wouldn't expect an XXL to make a difference in sleeve length, so I won't bother purchasing again.

I really like this top, color and material are very nice and soft however, whatever it is made of clings to my leggings and it doesn't matter what the leggings are made of.  I specifically bought this for the length to wear with leggings.  It's a great length but i won't be wearing it due to its clingy-ness.

This top was not like the photo in the listing. It is low quality and did not work for what I was going for.  I’m not one to make a return unless I spent a fortune and was not satisfied, so it has just sat in my dresser drawer for the past few months.

I just love the fabric of these tops This is my 2nd one like this It's not sweatshirt material but it's soft and warm I bought the fushia color and now this one in the white gray and blue and they're so versatile Good length for leggings or jeans Can dress them up or down These are quality tops and I'll probably buy another one for myself or as a gift I'd say these are TTS so if you're not sure about buying one I'd say go on and buy it I don't think you'd regret it

Love this sweatshirt!! The color is nice and the fit is great! I ordered up a size (xl) so it’s more loose and it’s perfect! It’s thick and heavier so it’s definitely not a cheap material. It washed up great too! I wear this instead of a jacket sometimes and it’s plenty warm enough with just a tshirt underneath. I just ordered more colors too.

The sweater I received is exactly what I ordered. It’s a loose style fit, like I expected, the color matches what I ordered, and it’s incredibly soft! Get this!! The fabric is amazing and so soft. I’m normally a large, but I got a medium and it fits perfectly!! This is a perfect weekend snuggly sweatshirt

Love this color, and the material was well. I feels and looks good.
Love this shirt/swearshirt. Super soft and comfortable. I read the reviews and decided to go down a size and it fits perfect. I would of got a large but got a medium and glad I did.

Maybe it’s time we all stop ordering clothes off of Amazon and go back to ordering from brands we trust. Annoyed because I needed to wear a pink sweatshirt for a breast cancer charity event.

The fit is terrific.  But the material is funky, weird brushed finish which I have not been able to get the shipping wrinkles out even after washing twice.  Fabric also feels like it will not be durable.
Perfect fit, very comfortable.

This is a great sweatshirt-type top without being a sweatshirt….. no sloppy hanging arms. You put this on and instantly elevate your style! And the fabric is so soft! Surprisingly soft and seems to wash well. Point removed because it doesn't have much shape and wrinkles easily.

The fabric is incredibly soft!  The fit is perfect but honestly the feel of the fabric has me!!!!!

Other than that, this sweatshirt fits true to size, is high-quality, cute, and comfortable.
The shirt came as described. Got xs 5 ft 4 120 pds fits

This is the absolute best sweatshirt ever! So so soft, fits great, and washed well. I'm going to get more in other colors. I totally recommend this top!

It is true to size, The color is well represented, the stitching is quality, and there has been no shrinkage whatsoever. This is a great value. I would highly recommend.

Bought a sz smaller than I usually wear because I didn’t want it too oversized. It’s perfect

This isn't a sweatshirt by any stretch of the imagination: The photo clearly shows a shirt that hangs as if it's a fleece sweatshirt - this thing does not hang in any way like the photo - which indicates a clear intent to deceive.
